flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: The basic steps to the method start with making two piles of rubber bands.
lines.text_raw: The basic steps to the method start with making two piles of rubber bands.

lines.text: Next you need to cross the piles so that the rubber bands overlap in the middle.
lines.text_raw: Next you need to cross the piles so that the rubber bands overlap in the middle.

lines.text: Now wrap a few rubber bands around the overlapping parts to keep them together.
lines.text_raw: Now wrap a few rubber bands around the overlapping parts to keep them together.

lines.text: Lastly, take the loose rubber bands and wrap them back around the pile till they are all nice and tight.  This will knot them all together and make it strong.
lines.text_raw: Lastly, take the loose rubber bands and wrap them back around the pile till they are all nice and tight.  This will knot them all together and make it strong.

lines.text: Make Rubberband Man's arms and legs in the same way and attach them with more rubber bands.  Form a ball of rubber bands at the top for his head.
lines.text_raw: Make Rubberband Man's arms and legs in the same way and attach them with more rubber bands.  Form a ball of rubber bands at the top for his head.

lines.text: Make several Rubberband Men and some musical instruments for them, and make a Rubberband Man Rubber Band!
lines.text_raw: Make several Rubberband Men and some musical instruments for them, and make a Rubberband Man Rubber Band!

guide.summary: Use rubber bands to make make a stretching and bouncing Rubberband Man.
guide.title: Rubberband Man
